define.text: The first step to produce the solution is to understand the problem:
We are trying to program the arm to make it possible to pick up the rubbish and transport it to the rubbish bin.
As we already have the arm, we should understand its capabilities:
The arm has five motors, 4 to move the arm around the space and 1 to open and close the claw.
The claw should be used to pick up the rubbish.
The claw is closed above the rubbish to pick up the rubbish and opened.

plan.text: Once we understand what should be done, a good practice is to implement a divide and conquer approach. Through this approach, we will divide our solution into different parts that we could solve on its own, then we could combine it at the end.
From the define stage, we would then need:
Learn the functions to move the arm from one location to another.
Learn how to operate the claw to be able to pick up the rubbish.
After being able to work these two subsystems we will be able to combine the work into one system solving our problem.
